General.Name: GFL Limited
General.Description: GFL Limited operates and manages multiplexes and cinema theatres in India. As of June 30, 2022, the company operated 163 multiplexes with 692 screens and a total seating capacity of 1,55,218 in 73 cities under the INOX brand name. It also engages in the real estate and property development activities. The company was formerly known as Gujarat Fluorochemicals Limited and changed its name to GFL Limited in July 2019. The company was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Mumbai, India.

3.Name: Mr. Vijay Kumar Soni
3.Title: Head of Projects and New Initiatives - Gujarat Fluorochemicals
